headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ to this field.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Requested fields. If this field is not set, the default fields ( profile_image and display_name ) will be returned.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: profile_image
fields.description: Temporary URL for the profile photo of the creator. The expiration time is included in the URL after the x-expires parameter, in the format of an Epoch/Unix timestamp in seconds. Validity period: around seven days.

fields.name: handle_name
fields.description: The username (handle) of the creator.

fields.name: display_name
fields.description: The display name (nickname) for the creator.

fields.name: bio
fields.description: The bio description of the creator.

fields.name: following_count
fields.description: The total number of accounts that the creator is following.

fields.name: followers_count
fields.description: The total number of followers for the creator.

fields.name: likes_count
fields.description: Total likes. The total number of times people have liked the creator's published videos.

fields.name: videos_count
fields.description: The total number of public videos posted by the creator.

fields.name: creator_rate
fields.description: Creator starting rate.

fields.name: rate
fields.description: Amount of the rate.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: Currency for the rate amount, in ISO 4217 code format. Example: EUR .

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: The code of the country or region where the creator is located, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. Example: US .

fields.name: content_labels
fields.description: The list of creator industry labels. Creator industry labels are assigned to creators based on the commercial content they produce, including ad creatives and branded content on their TikTok accounts, and represent their commercial experience in certain industries.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator industry label. Example: 11015001.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the creator industry label. Example: Tech Products & Tests .

fields.name: industry_labels
fields.description: The list of content tag labels. Content tag labels are assigned to creators based on the main focus of the creator’s TikTok account, and represent the direction of the creator’s organic content.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the content tag label. Example: 23000000000.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the content tag label. Example: News & Entertainment .

fields.name: audience_countries
fields.description: Three countries or regions that have the largest audience size.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country or region name, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. Example: US .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_genders
fields.description: Audience gender information.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Gender. Enum values: Female , Male .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_ages
fields.description: Audience age distribution.

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age group. Enum values: 25-34 , 35-44 , 55+ , Other .

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_devices
fields.description: Audience device information.

fields.name: device
fields.description: Device. Enum values: APPLE : Apple. SAMSUNG : Samsung. XIAOMI : Xiaomi. OPPO : Oppo. MOTOROLA : Motorola. OTHER : Other.

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.

fields.name: audience_usages
fields.description: Audience TikTok usage.

fields.name: usage
fields.description: Whether the audience uses TikTok frequently. Enum values: active : An audience is defined as active if they have logged into the TikTok app within the last 30 days. inactive : Inactive.

fields.name: percentage
fields.description: Percentage.
